solution_line_template: One lap corresponds to the perimeter of a rectangle of {length} m length and {width} m width: 2*{length} + 2 *{width} = <<2*{length}+2*{width}={perimeter}>>{perimeter} metres.
Each player has to do six turns of the field, so runs {num_laps}*{perimeter} = <<{num_laps}*{perimeter}={total_distance}>>{total_distance} meters.
